jobDescription: Job Number: R0021756Data AnalystKey Role:Work with clients and project and business leaders to identify analytical requirements. Interpret results using a variety of techniques that range from simple data aggregation via statistical analysis to complex data mining. Design, develop, implement, and maintain business solutions. Review data loaded into the data warehouse for accuracy. Recommend maintenance enhancements to data acquisition processes to improve the accuracy of data warehouse.Basic Qualifications:-5+ years of experience with overall IT-1+ years of experience with data analysis-Active Top Secret clearance-BA or BS degreeAdditional Qualifications:-Experience with Informatica-TS/SCI clearance-Multiple IT Certifications preferredClearance:Applicants selected will be subject to a security investigation and may need to meet eligibility requirements for access to classified information; Top Secret clearance is required.Were an EOE that empowers our peopleno matter their race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or veteran statusto fearlessly drive change.JHT
